titleStmt.title: The Kings Maiesties answer to the petition of the House of Commons, sent on Saturday last, the nine and twentieth of this instant January, 1642.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "1641" the '2' in date in caption title has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
